passwordRecovery.otpRecoveryContextualization: We received a request to reset the password for your MyFin account.
passwordRecovery.otpPrefix: Use the One-Time Password (OTP) below to proceed with the password recovery.
passwordRecovery.otpExpirationTimeText: This OTP is valid for 15 minutes only.
passwordRecovery.otpIfRequestNotMadeText: If you did not request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.
passwordRecovery.otpDoNotShareText: For your security, please do not share this OTP with anyone.
